name: Thomas A. Sample
abstract: To connect the public to an enhanced understanding of history through sound and coordinate resources to ensure the preservation of audio heritage.
title: The Importance of Preserving Audio Recordings

name: Jean Robles
abstract: To accept, gather, and steward resources, financial and otherwise, to advance the preservation of recorded audio and to ensure access to the audio heritage of the United States.
title: We Have So Much to Do!
